host.description: The host name of the database.
host.title: Host

shards.description: Comma separated list of shards you'd like to sync, by default all shards are synced.
shards.title: Shards

username.description: The username which is used to access the database.
username.title: Username

password.description: The password associated with the username.
password.title: Password

use_replica.description: Use a replica to pull data from
use_replica.title: Use replica?

use_rdonly.description: Use a rdonly replica to pull data from
use_rdonly.title: Use rdonly?

include_metadata.description: Include PlanetScale metadata in the sync. When enabled, this adds a column named `_planetscale_metadata` to each table containing a JSON object with the following fields: `vgtid_position` (the Vitess VGTID replication position), `extracted_at` (the extraction timestamp in nanoseconds), and `sequence_number` (a monotonically increasing per-sync sequence number).
include_metadata.title: Include metadata?

starting_gtids.title: Starting GTIDs
starting_gtids.description: A JSON string containing start GTIDs for every { keyspace: { shard: starting_gtid } }

max_retries.title: Max retries
max_retries.description: The max number of times we continue syncing after potential errors

timeout_seconds.title: Timeout (in seconds)
timeout_seconds.description: Timeout in seconds for a sync attempt

use_gtid_with_table_pks.title: Use GTID with table primary keys
use_gtid_with_table_pks.description: Use GTID position together with table primary keys

options.title: Customize serialization
options.description: The storage Provider or Location of the file(s) which should be replicated.

do_not_treat_tiny_int_as_boolean.title: Do not treat tinyint(1) as boolean
do_not_treat_tiny_int_as_boolean.description: If enabled, properties of type TinyInt(1) are output as TinyInt, and not boolean.
